# Data

## Weather

-   [CoAgMet](https://coagmet.colostate.edu/)

## Energy

-   [Alternative Fuels Data Center](https://afdc.energy.gov/)

-   [U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA)](https://www.eia.gov/opendata/)

    -   <https://github.com/ropensci/eia>

-   [Our World in Data](https://ourworldindata.org/energy)

-   [Ember](https://ember-climate.org/data/) is "an independent energy think tank that aims to accelerate the clean energy transition with data and policy". Data is available to download or through an API.

    -   <https://github.com/andypicke/emberr>

-   [GridStatus](https://www.gridstatus.io/home) provides data on the US electric grid from various sources. You can explore the data on their website, and they also have a API.

    -   <https://github.com/andypicke/rgridstatus>
